评论详情: I like the design of these earrings and they are comfortable to wear while sleeping. Which is the main reason I got them. One of them was difficult to unscrew. It was stuck. I had to use a pair of pliers, but was able to do it without damaging them. My only other complaint is that I would’ve liked the back just screw in even tighter, my ears are thin, so the earrings kind of push forward and hang and I have to keep pushing them back. But they are good to wear every day and help with an ear that I recently had re-pierced.
